name: Woo Order Export To Constant Contact (FREE)
author: WPSuperiors

sections.description:
Woo order export to constant contact plugin export users data from woocommerce order and merge into constant contact.

In general, this plugin is a Constant Contact plugin for WooCommerce.

Woo order export to constant contact plugin export woocommerce users data from woocommerce order and merge into constant contact.

This is the very first plugin on WordPress by which store administrator can send the WooCommerce order data directly to Constant Contact account list without any hassle.

Woo order export to constant contact plugin helps any WooCommerce store to collect data as well as export data into Constant Contact to run any promotion campaign.

Woo order export to constant contact plugin export woocommerce customer order email address, first Name and last name from woocommerce order and send it to Constant Contact account.

Check It Out Demo

WooCommerce -> Settings -> Constant Contact

Features

  • FREE Version
    🔸 Manually export user information from WooCommerce Order to your Constant Contact list.
    🔸 You can choose Constant Contact list within your WooCommerce settings.
    🔸 Automatic capture the list( ONLY ONE ) from your Constant Contact account.
    🔸 Constant Contact Subscriber ID will be visible at WooCommerce order list.
    🔸 Debug Log is available to check the detailed history.
    🔸 Step by step manual with screenshots are ready to get Constant Contact API Key, and Access Token.

  • PREMIUM Version, Check It Out
    🔸 Automatic export user information from WooCommerce Order to your Constant Contact list.
    🔸 Choose order status, when automatic export action will be done.
    🔸 Bulk order data export action is available as well as individual order data export.
    🔸 You can choose Constant Contact list within your WooCommerce settings.
    🔸 Automatic capture the lists ( ALL ) from your Constant Contact account.
    🔸 Constant Contact Subscriber ID will be visible at WooCommerce order list.
    🔸 Debug Log is available to check the detailed history.
    🔸 Step by step manual with screenshots are ready to get Constant Contact API Key, and Access Token.
    🔸 You may check the premium version demo from WPSperiors Demo

WooCommerce -> Settings -> Constant Contact

WPSuperiors hopes, this plugin help each WooCommerce stores throughout the world to collect order data into Constant Contact account to run any promotional campaign on an effective and easy way.

Good Luck ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly by seraching “Woo Order Export To Constant Contact” .
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. WooCommerce -> Settings -> Constant Contact
